en.text: Show AA damage on minions' HP bars

en.helpText:
Sends the attack order earlier than allowed.
Setting this too high will reduce the movement of your champion
Best value is around 0.04

Normally, setting it above 0 will cause stuttering
Increasing can be useful in some edge cases like when you have 2.50 AS, but
even then it doesn't really change THAT much.
Try lowering this when you have problems with cancelled autos

Time for the orb to wait for attack command to complete
Try increasing this if your autos cancel because the enemy leaves your range etc.
Too high value will make the orb chase enemies instead of follow cursor

en.text:
To set keybinds, check SparkTech.SDK/Modes
Also, check out HP Pred menu for farming config
